ComicInfo.Summary:
Cassie has found a friend for the first time in her life! But there's more to Sarah than meets the eye. What is the secret behind the arcade game BLUD BUS? And what does it have to do with the kids who keep turning up dead in a cornfield? The story behind Cassie's first case gets twisted!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------------|-----------------------------|------------------| | Reg | Regular Cover | Tim Seeley & Carlos Badilla | 1 | | Var | Variant Cover | Mike Norton & Nei Ruffino | 2 |
